attributes.action: Create a political advertising regulator to stop campaigns using misleading info
attributes.additional_details: The Advertising Standards Agency chose to exclude political advertising from their remit in 1997. However, (19 years later) a new code/regulator has not yet been established for political adverting. https://www.asa.org.uk/News-resources/Media-Centre/2014/Political-advertising.aspx#.V269RRH6vIV
attributes.background:
During the referendum both sides mislead the public, but without a regulator nothing can be done. Leaving the public with a distrust of the whole system.
It is time to fix this obvious flaw in our political system. 
How can we make informed decisions if we are misinformed?
